title: Should I start my NEET preparation from class 11? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to me NEET is the tough exam to crack. You should be first focus centered and mentally prepared for hardwork.you can opt for offline coaching and with that also go for online learning way in my opinion now days we all have welcome new e learning way That is online learning. It is best as it saves our money and we can see videos as much as we want to build our strong base and concepts In your daily schedule you must study with hardwork and determination power to prepare for NEET Undoubtedly NEET exams are one of the toughest and entrance exams in India and in order to pass it the preparations have to be up to the mark. It's great to see that you're willing to prepare for it right from the beginning, so here is something that you can do about it and that is instead of choosing any crowded and expensive coaching classes go for M LEARNING INDIA they provide videos especially designed for such entrance exams like NEET, NTSE, IIT JEE, AIIMS. The lectures are delivered by highly qualified and experienced professors so they know the best as too how to prepare for such an important exam. The perks of choosing M LEARNING INDIA are: You escape those crowded classes and expensive coaching.You get guidance by the best professors just by sitting at your home.You can play, pause and repeat the videos until you're completely clear with the concept. the content in the videos is beautifully explained which will be best compatible for your present studies and also it will saves up your cost and time which may be consumed by the offline institutes. along with that , they will provide you with the best self study material with lots of good questions to practice and regular doubts sessions . you can also download their app from the play store for free or subscribe to their channel on youtube. i hope that you will take a note of my recommendation,
